function.name: record_face
function.description: Register a user in the system. This function should only be executed when 'proactive_question' in user input is exactly 'who_are_you_response' and the user explicitly provides a name. If the user response is vague, avoid calling this function.

username.description: The name of the user that it's being introduced,  which should be a valid name (e.g., 'Luisa', 'John Doe').
